member.name: HTTP_KNOWN_HEADER
member.summary: TheHTTP_KNOWN_HEADER structure contains the header values for a known header from an HTTP request or HTTP response.

member.name: HTTP_KNOWN_HEADER.RawValueLength
member.summary: Size, in bytes, of the 8-bit string pointed to by the pRawValue member, not counting a terminating null character, if present. If RawValueLength is zero, then the value of the pRawValue element is meaningless.

member.name: HTTP_KNOWN_HEADER.pRawValue
member.summary: Pointer to the text of this HTTP header. Use RawValueLength to determine where this text ends rather than relying on the string to have a terminating null. The format of the header text is specified inRFC 2616.
